pkgmetadata.longdescription: Meta-Analysis for Diagnostic Test Studies // Bayesian inference analysis for bivariate meta-analysis of diagnostic test studies using integrated nested Laplace approximation with INLA. A purpose built graphic user interface is available. The installation of R package INLA is compulsory for successful usage. The INLA package can be obtained from http://www.r-inla.org. We recommend the testing version, which can be downloaded by running: install.packages("INLA", repos=c(getOption("repos"), INLA="https://inla.r-inla- download.org/R/testing"), dep=TRUE).
